console.log(block);
const block = await ethers.provider.getBlock(1);
console.log("Dernier bloc:", block);
const block = await ethers.provider.getBlock(latestBlockNumber);
const latestBlockNumber = await ethers.provider.getBlockNumber();
console.log("Dernier num√©ro de bloc:", latestBlockNumber);
const latestBlockNumber = await ethers.provider.getBlockNumber();
